description.p: “It is one of life’s greatest mysteries who would be stupid enough to procreate with a troll, but it did happen. Somehow… Nevertheless, half-trolls were born, abominable little things that they are. Their parentage got them one less finger and tusks that must make eating quite unpleasent. I thank the Gods that our empire houses so few, even if they are quite capable warriors. They did get me thining though: they can regenerate injuries and even limbs, so if I cut them just in the right placem will I be able to see a live soul?”
- Y. Mageshell, Manyhals of Death.

Half-trolls are one of the newest mortals to join Faleria, only coming into existence at around 567 p.p. As such, they haven’t been able to create their own nation or lead their own armies, in fact only on the Bysse Isles can there be found any half-troll settlement. Unlike Lenams or Ronams, half-trolls have not even gotten a true name. Altough new, they have scattered around the world like wildfire, descending from various types of trolls. Due to being so few, relatively to other mortals, they have a great sense of companionship towards one another, especially when they share ancestry or an ideal.

In the year 566 a young dwarven explorer, by the name of Oren Thunderock, set sail from his Silvanian home in hopes of discovering new lands in the middle of the Unexplored Sea. During his voyage he insulted the whale Babenga, who promptly sunk his ship. He washed ashore on a deserted island, only inhabited by the troll Shima. At first, she tied him to a stake and covered him in sald so she could eat him. He somehow charmed her into not only sparing him, but also laying with him. She began expecting and was worried he’d leave before their children were born, so for three months she stayed awake watching him. Being that trolls are huge compared to dwarves, Shima gave birth to a litter of the first half-trolls. She was exhausted after the fact, finally falling asleep, an opportunity Oren couldn’t ignore, so he set sail and left.

For years Oren sailed and for years Oren sunk. From Shima’s Isle he sailed west to Scanduri, where he got trapped in a sand worm’s cave, only to be saved by a sand troll, that he coupled with. When leaving the Scandurian ports, a giant storm sunk his ship and crew, leading him to Manyhal. There, he got mixed in the middle of a raging war by aiding trolls who were fleeing their burning homes. One got very friendly as a thank you. After another year, he left the warring continent and headed east but got boarded by pires and kidnapped. Forced to work for them until he burnt their ship in order to escpae onto a nearby Njörsan fishing village. Turns out the village was deserted. He wandered the snow covered fields for days until an ice troll with a boat. He quickly got access to that boat.
When he finally found his shining home on the Silvermace Empire, he almost immediatly left. There are no trolls in Zeiloryn.

Due to their sizeable tusks, half-trolls cannot produce the sound of the letter l, producing a different type of r instead. Their names hold immense significance, inheriting their mother’s name’s last two letters as their first syllable, such as Gallanda, Damulis, Isterin, Inocuscia and Iamanda.
Their troll blood still holds some advantageous properties.
Ability Score Increase. Your Constitution score increases by 2. In addition, one other ability score of your choice increases by 1.
Age. Half-Trolls reach adulthood at around 15 and live for about a century.
Size. Half-Trolls stand at between 6’5 and 7’5 feet tall and average about 175 pounds. Your size is Medium.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

Darkvision. Due to your ancestry you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it was dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of green.

Half-Troll Regeneration. The blood that courses through your veins stems from creatures with an incredible healing ability. As a bonus action, you can regenerate some of your wounds, regaining hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier. If you have been hit with acid or fire damage you cannot use this feature until the start of your next turn. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. You can use this feature to recuperate limbs or heal injuries instead of gaining hit points. You cannot regenerate your head.
Language. You can speak, read and write two languages of your choice.
Mortal subtypes. Four main ancestries of troll show themselves in half-trolls: Ice, Sand, Tropical and War Half-Trolls. Choose one of these subtypes.
For more details and updates, visit: https://homebrewery.naturalcrit.com/share/XxRtcH01z5I5

Amakiir, Amastacia, Galanodel, Holimion, Ilphelkiir, Liadon, Meliamne, Nai'lo, Siannodel, Xiloscient

As a bonus action, you can regenerate some of your wounds, regaining hit points equal to your level + your Constitution modifier. If you have been hit with acid or fire damage you cannot use this feature until the start of your next turn. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. You can use this feature to recuperate limbs or heal injuries instead of gaining hit points. You cannot regenerate your head.

sheet.description:
As a bonus action, you can regenerate some of your wounds, regaining hit points equal to your level + {{constitution:modifier}} (CON). If you have been hit with acid or fire damage you cannot use this feature until the start of your next turn. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest. You can use this feature to recuperate limbs or heal injuries instead of gaining hit points. You cannot regenerate your head.
• Regeneration: Regain {{regeneration:hp}} hit points.

description.p: Four main ancestries of troll show themselves in half-trolls: Ice, Sand, Tropical and War Half-Trolls. Choose one of these subtypes.

As a descendant of ice trolls, low temperatures do not affect you, as your light blue or white skin is impervious to it. You have purple or pink eyes and black, blue, pink, purple or brown hair and, as all half-trolls, you have two big tusks that come in a variety of shapes and sizes.
Descendant to the troll Gaelea, the shipmaster, you have grown accustomed to fishing boats and javelin fishing and generally feel comfortable living close to the water.
Nÿjorsan training. You are proficient with medium armor, javelins and war picks.
Cold Shores. You are proficient with water vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Investigation, Perception or Survival.
Re-icing. When using your half-troll regeneration, instead of choosing to recuperate hit points you may choose to heal yourself of one disease, poisonous effect or short-term curse.
You are proficient with medium armor, javelins and war picks.

sheet.description: You are proficient with medium armor, javelins and war picks.

description.p: You are proficient with water vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Investigation, Perception or Survival.

sheet.description: You are proficient with water vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Investigation, Perception or Survival.

description.p: When using your half-troll regeneration, instead of choosing to recuperate hit points you may choose to heal yourself of one disease, poisonous effect or short-term curse.

sheet.description: When using your half-troll regeneration, instead of choosing to recuperate hit points you may choose to heal yourself of one disease, poisonous effect or short-term curse.

description.p: As a descendant of sand trolls, high temperatures do not affect you, as your red, orange, yellow or sand coloured skin is impervious to it. You have black or orange eyes and white, yellow, brown, green or cyan hair and, as all half-trolls, you have two big tusks that come in a variety of shapes and sizes.
Descendant to the troll Fejuin, wormeater, you have have grown accustomed to sand storms and dealing with the dangers of the desert and generally feel comfortable with dry food.
Scandurian training. You are proficient with light armor, heavy slings and kwikwiks.
Desert Traveller. You are proficient with land vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Animal handling, Insight or Survival.
Sandstrum. You can see in lightly obscured areas within 30 feet of you as if it wasn’t obscured and in heavily obscured areas as if it were lightly obscured.
You are proficient with light armor, heavy slings and kwikwiks.

sheet.description: You are proficient with light armor, heavy slings and kwikwiks.

description.p: You are proficient with land vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Animal handling, Insight or Survival.

sheet.description: You are proficient with land vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Animal handling, Insight or Survival.

description.p: You can see in lightly obscured areas within 30 feet of you as if it wasn’t obscured and in heavily obscured areas as if it were lightly obscured.

sheet.description: You can see in lightly obscured areas within {{sandstrum:range}} feet of you as if it wasn’t obscured and in heavily obscured areas as if it were lightly obscured.

description.p: As a descendant of swamp trolls, moist environments do not affect you, as your blue or green skin is impervious to it. You have green of blue, green or brown eyes and pink, green, white, black, brown or blue hair and, as all half-trolls, you have two big tusks that come in a variety of shapes and sizes.

Descendant to the troll Shima, the trapped, you have grown exploring the Bysso Isles and are accustomed to the quiet of nature and the peace of sunny days and generally feel comfortable with sleeping in places with a lot of bugs.
Bysso-Islander training. You are proficient with shields, longbows and spears.
Island Explorer. You are proficient with water vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Medicine, Nature or Survival.
Swamp Spirit. Being used to swampy terrain made it so you are uneffected by nonmagical difficult terrain.
You are proficient with shields, longbows and spears.

sheet.description: You are proficient with shields, longbows and spears.

description.p: You are proficient with water vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Medicine, Nature or Survival.

sheet.description: You are proficient with water vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Medicine, Nature or Survival.

description.p: Being used to swampy terrain made it so you are uneffected by nonmagical difficult terrain.

sheet.description: You are uneffected by nonmagical difficult terrain.

description.p: As a descendant of lake trolls, dry environments do not affect you, as your green, brown, cyan or aqua skin keeps you permanently fresh. You have brown or black eyes and brown, black, red, orange or purple hair and, as all half-trolls, you have two big tusks that come in a variety of shapes and sizes.

Descendant to the troll Pfafefa, the runner, you have grown accustomed to always being on the move and have a difficulty calling somewhere home and generally feel comfortable with leaving things behind.
Manyhalian training. You are proficient with medium armor, light crossbows and greatclubs.
War Scout. You are proficient with land vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Animal handling, Intimidation or Religion.
Unprovoked. You have advantage when rolling for initiative.
You are proficient with medium armor, light crossbows and greatclubs.

sheet.description: You are proficient with medium armor, light crossbows and greatclubs.

description.p: You are proficient with land vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Animal handling, Intimidation or Religion.

sheet.description: You are proficient with land vehicles. Additionally, choose two from Athletics, Acrobatics, Animal handling, Intimidation or Religion.
